jobDescription: EMA is searching for a full-time Nocturnist to expertly manage the care of adult inpatients at our growing, established hospital medicine program at Reston Hospital Center in Reston, VA. 84 hours biweekly;$251,160 base Nocturnist salary Plus additional $15K night shift stipendPlus a Signing/Relocation Package;Plus up to $7,000 annual Incentive Bonus; Plus 96 hours of PTO/yr Full-time benefits for you and your family; and Accepting IM BC/BP applicants.Reston Hospital Center, a 186 bed hospital, is an expanding full-service medical/surgical hospital that has served the residents of growing western Fairfax and eastern Loudoun Counties since 1986. The hospital is conveniently located within Reston's vibrant Town Center. Recently ranked 7th out of 100 of the Best Places to live by CNN Money, Reston, Virginia is located about 30 minutes outside Washington, DC and minutes away from Dulles International Airport. It has a growing reputation as a technology hub near Washington Dulles International Airport and as of fall 2014 will be connected to the Washington, DC Metro system. EMA, founded in 1971, has managed contracts at Reston Hospital Center since it opened in 1986. We staff the Adult Hospitalist program, the Emergency Department, the Pediatric Hospitalist/ED Program, and the Neonatal Hospitalist Program.
